entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
